message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have a smaller share, but I'll still give you a good deal!
I'll take a smaller share this time, but I still want a decent chunk of the pie!
You're getting greedy, Alice! I'll give you a slightly larger share this time, but don't expect me to be generous!
I'll take a small share, but I'm hoping you'll see sense and accept this offer!
You're getting desperate, Alice! I'll give you the majority of the money this time, but don't think you're getting off that easy!
